ROBOBOTS

A Mission driven / third person shooter with a comedic narrative treatment (think Hot Shots/ Naked Gun/Top Secret) )where players must complete different missions to progress. To do this they must pilot different mechs that are scattered in each level.

"STORY"
For centuries the space colonies blue and orange have live in peace but one day mech technology has finally reached the point in which we can have cool robot battles, so the “Evil” blue army declares war against the orange army.

Now it depends on you to defeat the evil opposing blue army… While having  fun piloting and fighting against other mechs.

Some obstacles can only be cleared without a mech and others only inside one. Players must hop off and on of the mechs to complete different objectives.
